text: The Nissan Micra is a subcompact car produced by Nissan since 1982. It entered its second generation in 1992, then its third generation in 2002, and its fourth generation in 2010. It can have three or five doors and three or four cylinder engines. The Micra is called the March in some countries including Japan. == Gallery == File:Nissan Micra front 20071212.jpg|First generation File:Nissan Micra front 20080116.jpg|Second generation File:2010 Nissan Micra N-TEC 1.2 Front.jpg|Third generation File:Nissan Micra 1.2 Acenta (K13) – Frontansicht, 17.
